ActJudges Act
SubjectSandra D. Lewis** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. James L. Lewis
PrecisGranting of an annuity to SANDRA D. LEWIS, widow of the Hon. James L. Lewis, Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective August 17, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
